law.history: Repealed 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 104, sec. 28, effective June 25, 2009. -- Created 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 175, sec. 27, effective April 24, 2008.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Administrative regulations establishing standards for license testing, prelicensure education, and continuing education requirements for mortgage professionals.
